input.sentences: we love to see the fireworks every year .
they always have such pretty colors .
i love how they light up the night sky .
the many different color explosions are so amazing .
we always have such a great time and we look forward to it every year .
output.sentences: I love going to the baseball game and watching the fireworks afterwards.
The people in charge of the fireworks never disappoint with the fireworks show.
My favorite ones are the red and green ones.
It kind of reminds me of rain when they fall down from the sky.
The finale is always spectacular and signals the end to a great evening.
